name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Walter BURESS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Walter BURESS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: George E. Goldstein, Pottstown, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Kenneth S. Gallant, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 493
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Walter BURESS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 17, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
George E. Goldstein, Pottstown, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Kenneth S. Gallant, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
